column5: is this aloud and if so has any 1 done it like what would u feed em?
You can't transport live fish...unless you get a permit of some kind.....other will have more info I'm sure.
ive kept some small gamefish here and their bass are really cool but they eat to much. just remember thats part of your possesion limit !!!! i let go my bass where i caught him from!!

so u can transport them because i go to sturgeon tomorrow and want some perch for tank and possably a walleye if it can fit in tank and have room to swim. when i get money i would like to buy a bigger tank like 100 gallons +
yeah you definitely shouldnt keep a walleye in your tank.
NO.. it's illegal to transport live game fish unless you have a permit to do so.
